name: Old Town Steve
description:
Keep in mind that dying a lot is part of the design.

Songs featured are my own remix of:

  • Lil Nas X - Old Town Road
  • Woody Jackson - Outlaws From the West

Controls (if you skipped the Tutorial and is confused):

  • A/D - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Enter - Shoot
  • Ctrl - Dodge
  • Shift - Dash
  • Esc - Exit Level
  • Brain - Important Device

There is also an easter egg awaiting to be found. Enjoy!

-Master Huhu
